events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their vehicle and another car on highway 95 during morning traffic.
The claim was categorized under auto accident based on the customer's description of the vehicle collision incident.
An experienced auto claims agent was assigned promptly to handle the claim and ensure smooth proceedings.
The insurance company acknowledged the customer's auto accident claim and confirmed receipt of initial information.
Customer was requested to submit vehicle damage photos, police report, and repair estimates for further evaluation.
All requested documents including photos of the damaged car and official police report have been submitted by the customer.
The investigation team began reviewing the submitted evidence related to the vehicle collision and liability.
Investigation concluded confirming the other party was at fault in the auto accident based on the provided documentation.
A settlement offer covering the repair costs and rental car reimbursement was proposed to the claimant immediately.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the clear communication and prompt settlement proposal for their auto accident.
Formal approval was granted for the claim payout based on full agreement of the settlement terms with the customer.
The approved settlement amount was disbursed promptly to cover the vehicle repairs and additional expenses.
The auto accident claim was officially closed after confirming that all payments were received and repairs completed.
The case files and all related documentation for this auto accident claim were archived for future reference.
